resources.string: Anuradhapura is a major city in Sri Lanka. Travell with me get you all around Anurashapura in just 2 days.
Kandy is a large city in Central Sri Lanka. Kandy is famed for Temple of Tooth and for many secred Buddhist sites.
Colombo is the capital city of Sri Lanka. It has a long history as a port on ancient east-west trade routes ruled successively by the Portuguese, Dutch and British.
Nuwaraeliya is a city in the tea country hills of central Sri Lanka. The natural Landscaped Hakgala Botnical Garden displays roses and tree forms and shelters monkeys and blue magpies.
